chapter_goal: Test Su Mingyue's temporal stabilization plan

characters.name: Lin Xiu
characters.personality: Skilled in psychological manipulation, always wears a glove on the left hand
characters.health_status: Heterochromia (left eye golden, right eye brown)

characters.name: Chen Xiaodao
characters.personality: Seems timid but actually has amazing powers of observation

relationships.new_detail: Chen Xiaodao's observation skills help anticipate Su Mingyue's medical needs during the experiment
Chen notices subtle inconsistencies in Lin Xiu's poker face that reveal his temporal knowledge

scenes.name: Observation Deck
scenes.atmosphere: Unnaturally still sea with ghostly moonlight

events.name: Equipment Setup
events.details: Chen Xiaodao secretly observes while officially helping set up medical equipment, noting temporal stabilizer's interface patterns match ship's laundry system
consequences: Chen recognizes control sequence from crew training
Prepares backup plan using service elevator access

events.name: Temporal Vision
events.details: Chen's UV allergy acts up during experiment, causing him to see 'shadow crew' from different time periods including his own future self
consequences: Confirms ship exists across multiple timelines simultaneously
Burns arm reaching through temporal distortion

events.name: Hidden Observation
events.details: Chen spots Lin Xiu secretly adjusting stabilizer settings to different values than shown on display
consequences: Chen photographs discrepancy with hidden phone
Notes Lin Xiu's concealed weapon is future-model tech

events.name: Dimensional Trace
events.details: Using staff access, Chen reviews surveillance logs showing the experiment created energy signatures matching the ship's original disappearance
consequences: Suspects Lin Xiu altered main records

events.name: Burn Treatment
events.details: Su Mingyue treats Chen's temporal burns, realizing his unique sensitivity could be key to stabilizing the ship
consequences: Joint plan formed to use Chen as temporal anchor
Seven-day countdown now visible on Chen's skin

events.name: Uniform Discovery
events.details: Changing bandages, Chen finds his spare uniform contains service records dated 20 years in future with his name
consequences: Proof crew is trapped in temporal loop
Emergency meeting called with Su Mingyue
